1. City Council

City Council
============

1. ![MayorRobertCrawley](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1040 "MayorRobertCrawley")

   #### Robert Crawley

   Mayor

1. ![MichaelCourtright](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1041 "MichaelCourtright")

   #### Michael Courtright

1. ![JamesThorne](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1038 "JamesThorne")

   #### James Thorne

1. ![JoshMassey](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1039 "JoshMassey")

   #### Josh Massey

1. ![SpenceRedwine](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1042 "SpenceRedwine")

   #### Spence Redwine

1. ![AaronThomas](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1037 "AaronThomas")

   #### Aaron Thomas

1. ![TeresaAdams](https://www.denisontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1036 "TeresaAdams")

   #### Teresa Adams

   Council Place 6/Mayor Pro Tem

The City Council consists of 7 members elected by the residents of the City of Denison. Four of the council members are elected from single member districts, places 1 through 4, and 3 are elected at large, including the mayor and places 5 and 6.

* Appoints the city manager, who executes the laws and administers the government of the city
